verses.name: Lamentations 4:16
verses.text: The anger of the Lord hath divided them; he will no more regard them: they respected not the persons of the priests, they favoured not the elders.

verses.name: Lamentations 4:17
verses.text: As for us, our eyes as yet failed for our vain help: in our watching we have watched for a nation that could not save us.

verses.name: Lamentations 4:18
verses.text: They hunt our steps, that we cannot go in our streets: our end is near, our days are fulfilled; for our end is come.
